messages.title: BACK ME TO LEAD BRITAIN'S BREXIT NEGOTIATIONS
messages.content: Just 11 days after you vote in this unique and crucial election, the European Union wants to start Brexit negotiations with Britain.

messages.title: A LOSS OF JUST 6 SEATS AND THERESA MAY'S GOVERNMENT LOSES ITS MAJORITY - PUTTING BREXIT NEGOTIATIONS AT RISK
DON'T RISK THE CHAOS OF A HUNG PARLIAMENT & JEREMY CORBYN MESSING UP BREXIT

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lead Brexit negotiations on behalf of our country, avoid the risk of a hung parliament and Jeremy Corbyn messing up Brexit.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Bury South will decide. A loss of just 6 seats and Theresa May's government loses its majority - putting Brexit negotiations at risk.

issues.brexitEurope: Lead Brexit negotiations on behalf of our country, avoid the risk of a hung parliament and Jeremy Corbyn messing up Brexit.

images.caption: Theresa May portrait with the message to back her for Brexit negotiations.
